knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r libraries, message = FALSE, cache=TRUE}
library(GEOquery)
library(preprocessCore)
library(SummarizedExperiment)
library(limma)
library(dplyr)
library(illuminaHumanv3.db) # Illumina HumanHT-12 V3.0 expression beadchip
```

```{r, cache = TRUE}
setwd('~/Desktop/RA work/build_TB_data/Signatures/Berry')
getwd()

urls = getGEOSuppFiles("GSE19444", fetch_files = FALSE)
url_cel <- as.character(urls$url[1])
temp <- tempfile()
tempd <- tempdir()
download.file(url_cel,temp)
untar(temp,exdir = tempd)


#untar('GSE19444/GSE19444_RAW.tar', exdir="GSE19444/GSE19444_Raw")
files <- list.files(tempd, pattern = "txt.*");files

## Special handling for GSM484599_LTB_LON_test009.txt.gz
GSE19444_Non_normalized_list <-lapply(files[-which(files=='GSM484599_LTB_LON_test009.txt.gz')],
                                      function(x) read.delim(paste0(tempd,'/',x),  row.names=1, header=TRUE, col.names = c(gsub('_.*','',x),paste0(gsub('_.*','',x),'.Pval'))))

GSE19444_Non_normalized_temp <- do.call(cbind,GSE19444_Non_normalized_list)

GSM484599 <- na.omit(read.delim(paste0(tempd,'/GSM484599_LTB_LON_test009.txt.gz')))
colnames(GSM484599) <- c('ID_REF','GSM484599','GSM484599.Pval')
GSE19444_Non_normalized <- cbind(GSE19444_Non_normalized_temp,GSM484599[,-1])
dim(GSE19444_Non_normalized)

unlink(tempd)
unlink(temp)
```

```{r}
# Remove P-values
GSE19444_Non_pvalue <- GSE19444_Non_normalized[,-grep('.Pval',colnames(GSE19444_Non_normalized))]
GSE19444_Non_normalized_counts <- GSE19444_Non_pvalue
dim(GSE19444_Non_pvalue)
```

```{r convert ProbeID to Gene Symbol, cache=TURE}
# Annotation
PROBES <- row.names(GSE19444_Non_pvalue) # Should subsitute to Normalized file???
OUT <- AnnotationDbi::select(illuminaHumanv3.db, PROBES, "SYMBOL")
OUT[is.na(OUT)] <- 'Unmapped'

# Map ProbeID to Gene Symbol 
OUT_collapse <- OUT %>% group_by(PROBEID) %>%  # Multiple gene symbols map to the same ProbeID
  summarise(SYMBOL = paste(SYMBOL, collapse=", "), times = length(unlist(strsplit(SYMBOL, ",")))) 

GSE19444_Non_pvalue$ID_REF <- row.names(GSE19444_Non_pvalue)
GSE19444_final <- GSE19444_Non_pvalue %>% left_join(OUT_collapse, by=c('ID_REF' = "PROBEID")) %>% as_tibble()

arrange(GSE19444_final, desc(times))
```

```{r create column data}
gse <- getGEO("GSE19444", GSEMatrix =  F)
data_characteristic <- lapply(1:length(GSMList(gse)), function(x)  
  GSMList(gse)[[x]]@header$characteristics_ch1)
characteristic_table <- sapply(1:length(data_characteristic[[1]]), function(x) 
  sapply(data_characteristic, '[[',x)) 
## Demo convert geographical region: Kenya to Kenya
characteristic_data_frame <- sub('(.*?): ','',characteristic_table) %>% DataFrame()
#colnames(characteristic_data_frame) <- gsub(':.*','',data_characteristic[[1]])
colnames(characteristic_data_frame) <- c('Age','Gender','Ethnicity','TBStatus','GeographicalRegion','BcgVaccinated','BirthRegion','TST',
'exposure_latent', 'index_case_disease_site', 'smear_of_index_case', 'modal_x_ray_grade','SputumSmearStatus','sputum_culture', 'bal_smear', 'bal_culture','isolate_sensitivity')

row.names(characteristic_data_frame) <- colnames(GSE19444_Non_normalized_counts)
head(characteristic_data_frame)
```

```{r Create RowData MetaData and summarized experiment}
# Create Row data annotation
row_data <- DataFrame(SYMBOL=GSE19444_final$SYMBOL)

# Create Metadata
GSE19444_experimentData <- new('MIAME',
                      name="Damien Chaussabel",
                      lab="Baylor Institute for Immunology Research",
                      contact="DChaussabel@benaroyaresearch.org",
                      title="An interferon-inducible neutrophil-driven blood transcriptional signature in human tuberculosis",
                      abstract="An example SummarizedExperimentObject",
                      url="10.1038/nature09247",
                      pubMedIds = '20725040',
                      other=list(Platform = 'Illumina HumanHT-12 V3.0 expression beadchip'))

GSE19444_summarizedExperiemnt <- SummarizedExperiment(assays = list(GSEGSE19444_Non_normalized_counts= as.matrix(GSE19444_Non_normalized_counts)), colData = characteristic_data_frame, rowData = row_data, metadata = list(GSE19444_experimentData)); GSE19444_summarizedExperiemnt

```

```{r}
saveRDS(GSE19444_summarizedExperiemnt, ascii=FALSE, file='GSE19444/GSE19444_summarizedExperiemnt.RDS')
```
